alert.note: Alert for Christian; Macon; Sangamon (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 9:02AM CDT until August 11 at 9:30AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN CHRISTIAN...EAST CENTRAL SANGAMON AND MACON COUNTIES... At 902 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Forsyth to near Niantic, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Emergency management. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Decatur around 910 AM CDT. Mount Zion and Long Creek around 915 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Macon. This includes Interstate 72 between mile markers 121 and 146. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
